title: Mental Health in the Modern Workplace
description: Discussion on BBC Radio 4's Psychology Today about the rising mental health challenges in professional environments and practical strategies for workplace wellbeing.

title: The Psychology of High Performance
description: Keynote presentation at the International Conference on Occupational Psychology, exploring how psychological principles can enhance professional performance while maintaining mental health.

title: Relationship Counselling: Modern Challenges
description: Featured interview on ITV's This Morning discussing how modern technology and work patterns are affecting relationships and practical advice for couples.

title: Anxiety Management for Professionals
description: Guest appearance on The Professional's Podcast, sharing evidence-based strategies for managing anxiety in high-pressure professional environments.

title: Building Resilience in Healthcare Workers
description: Workshop presentation at the NHS Mental Health Summit, focusing on resilience-building strategies specifically tailored for healthcare professionals.

title: The Science of Stress and Recovery
description: In-depth interview with Psychology Today magazine about the psychological and physiological impacts of chronic stress and evidence-based recovery strategies.

title: Mental Health Stigma in Professional Settings
description: Panel discussion on Sky News about breaking down mental health stigma in professional environments and creating supportive workplace cultures.

title: Mindfulness for Busy Professionals
description: Guest episode on The Mindful Leader podcast, exploring practical mindfulness techniques that can be integrated into busy professional schedules.

title: The Future of Mental Health Care
description: Presentation at the Digital Health Conference about the role of technology in mental health care delivery and the future of therapeutic interventions.

title: Work-Life Balance in the Digital Age
description: Feature interview in Harvard Business Review discussing the challenges of maintaining work-life balance in our always-connected world and practical solutions.

title: Understanding Trauma in the Workplace
description: Educational video series for LinkedIn Learning about recognizing and addressing workplace trauma, including secondary trauma in helping professions.

title: Emotional Intelligence and Leadership
description: Workshop at the Executive Leadership Summit exploring the relationship between emotional intelligence and effective leadership in modern organizations.
